attributes.action: prevent James Allen from being involved with Formula 1 television coverage as of January 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the 'Lewis Hamilton effect' and the growing interest in Formula 1, I ask the government and BBC not to allow James Allen near a racetrack with a microphone ever again.
His dyer commentary and delusions of grandeur have made watching F1 a painful experience.
I ask that next year he is removed from his position and someone who is neutral in support and of sound mind be drafted in to replace.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
